author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Stratech Systems Ltd v Nyam Chiu Shin (Yan Qiuxin) and Others
counsel: N Sreenivasan and Collin Choo (Straits Law Practice LLC) for plaintiff; S Suressh and Melissa Quek (Harry Elias Partnership) for first and second defendants; Goh Phai Cheng SC, Christopher Goh and Melvin Lum (Ang and Partners) for third defendant
tags-parsed: Tort/Confidence and trade secrets/Whether plaintiff adduced sufficient evidence to sustain an action for unauthorized use of confidential information and trade secrets.
Tort/Inducement of breach of contract/Whether third defendant guilty of inducing first and second defendant to join company in breach of their civil obligations to plaintiff.
